title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: Description: When adding a new localization key, it is not allowed to leave the key blank. If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in a chart. Steps to reproduce:
OB:
1. In the properties file, leave the key blank, but make sure it has a valid value.
2. Observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB:
1. In the properties file, leave the key blank, but make sure it has a valid value.
2. Expect the externalized text to be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Find the localization key that needs to be added.
3. Leave the key blank, but provide a valid value.
4. Save the file.
5. Open the chart and verify that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
